src:
山本美月と交際発覚の瀬戸康史　舞台げいこで熱演「全感覚で」観て

06 Nov 2019

　女優の多部未華子（３０）と俳優の瀬戸康史（３１）が６日、神奈川・ＫＡＡＴ神奈川芸術劇場ホールで、舞台「ドクター・ホフマンのサナトリウム～カフカ第４の長編～」（７日～２４日、同所）の公開げいこを行った。
　１０月１日に写真家の熊田貴樹氏と結婚を発表した多部と、１０月３０日に女優・山本美月（２８）との真剣交際が発覚した瀬戸の共演。共に“ビッグニュース”直後の舞台だったが、多部は、「毎日楽しく稽古をしてきました」とチームワークをアピールした。序盤では、２人が婚約者として登場し、結婚後の暮らしを幸せそうに語るシーンも描かれた。
　物語は、現実世界パートと小説パートが入り交じって進行し、多くの出演者が複数役を演じる。熱演を披露した瀬戸は「この作品は視覚や聴覚はもちろん、それ以外の感覚も刺激される、全感覚で観るものだと思います」と演出面のこだわりも明かした。
　瀬戸は１０月３０日、週刊文春オンラインで、１０月２１日から５夜連続で山本の自宅マンションに宿泊したことなどが報じられていた。
text:
Watching Yasushi Seto's enthusiastic performance at Geiko Yamamoto “all sensations”

06 Nov 2019

Actress Mikako Tabe (30) and actor Yasushi Seto (31) at the Kanagawa Arts Center Hall, Kanagawa Arts Theater Hall, “Dr. Hoffman's Sanatorium-Kafka 4th Feature” (7th-24th) , The same place).
A joint performance by Seto, where a serious relationship between Tabe, who announced her marriage with photographer Takaki Kumada on October 1, and actress Mizuki Yamamoto (28) was discovered on October 30. Both were the stage immediately after “Big News”, but Tabe appealed his teamwork, saying, “I enjoyed rehearsals every day.” In the early stage, two people appeared as fiances, and the scene of talking about life after marriage happily was drawn.
”The story is a mix of real world and novel parts, and many performers play multiple roles. Seto, who showed his passionate performance, revealed his commitment to the production, saying, “I think this work will be seen in all senses, which stimulates other senses as well as vision and hearing.”
Seto reported on October 30 that he stayed at Yamamoto's home apartment for five consecutive nights from October 21st at Weekly Bunharu Online.
